text:
TradeGecko | Singapore / Toronto | ONSITE https://tradegecko.com - we're building tools to power commerce companies, we get to help 10s of 1000s entrepreneurs build amazing businesses with tech. We want people that love understanding and helping businesses scale.

Positions: 1. Senior Backend / Full-stack Engineers / Rails / JS. 2. VP of Engineering

Stack: Rails, Ember.js (we're not precious about your exp.)

Interview process: 1. Phone/Skype screen, 2. Small Engineering Project, 3. Culture-fit interview, 4. Go/no-go

Visit: https://tradegecko.workable.com/j/86A2AD311A
